metadata.description: Sharing cultural foods conversation for second-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何分享中国文化食物。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'This is a traditional Chinese dumpling'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: This is a traditional Chinese dumpling called jiaozi.

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! You explained that beautifully!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Would you like to try some?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Would you like to try some Chinese food?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Sharing culture through food is wonderful!
